channel.title: callus on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in callus on funPlantGenes

item.title: AdNAC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc26399 Gene Symbol: AdNAC2 Gene Name: Genome: Genome_version:Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Upregulation of AdMsrB1 in response to ethylene requires TFs AdNAC2 and AdNAC72.

item.title: CAMTA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: EVM0036869.1 Gene Symbol: CAMTA2 Gene Name: hyper-DMR-associated gene Genome: Species: Pyrus pyrifolia Functional Descriptions: One of the genes, CAMTA2 (EVM0036869.

item.title: CsPHT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs6g07670 Gene Symbol: CsPHT4|2 Gene Name: plastid-type phosphate transporter 4|2 Genome: citrus genome database (http://citrus.

item.title: CsSCL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ciclev10019083m , CsUn_pb052510 Gene Symbol: CsSCL2 Gene Name: SCARECROW-LIKE 2 Genome: database Orange Genome annotation project Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Identified 2 csi-miR171c–targeted SCARECROW-LIKE genes CsSCL2 and CsSCL3 (CsSCL2/3), which exert positive feedback regulation on csi-miR171c expression.

item.title: CsSCL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ciclev10019094m , CsUn_pb052500 Gene Symbol: CsSCL3 Gene Name: SCARECROW-LIKE 3 Genome: database Orange Genome annotation project Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Identified 2 csi-miR171c–targeted SCARECROW-LIKE genes CsSCL2 and CsSCL3 (CsSCL2/3), which exert positive feedback regulation on csi-miR171c expression.

item.title: D6;OSH15
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g03770 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0129700 Gene Symbol: D6 OSH15 Oskn3 RLB Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FcrNAC22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FcrNAC22 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fortunella crassifolia Functional Descriptions: Red light-induced kumquat fruit coloration is attributable to increased carotenoid metabolism regulated by FcrNAC22.

item.title: GhSPL10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A12G0866 Gene Symbol: GhSPL10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The GhmiR157a–GhSPL10 regulatory module controls initial cellular dedifferentiation and callus proliferation in cotton by modulating ethylene-mediated flavonoid biosynthesis.

item.title: GhTCE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G2316 Gene Symbol: GhTCE1 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhTCE1–GhTCEE1 dimers regulate transcriptional reprogramming during wound-induced callus formation in cotton Identify GhTCE1, a basic helix–loop–helix family transcription factor, and its interacting partners as a central regulatory module of early cell fate transition during in vitro dedifferentiation of cotton (Gossypium hirsutum).

item.title: GhTCEE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D11G3523 Gene Symbol: GhTCEE1 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhTCE1–GhTCEE1 dimers regulate transcriptional reprogramming during wound-induced callus formation in cotton.

item.title: HDA710
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g12380 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0215200 Gene Symbol: HDA710 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: HvPDS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU4Hr1G077450 Gene Symbol: HvPDS Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our previous study reported that knockdown of the barley phytoene desaturase gene HvPDS by virus-induced gene silencing resulted in a photobleaching phenotype in seedlings Agrobacterium-mediated transformation was performed on microspore-derived callus to target the HvPDS gene, and T0 albinos with targeted mutations were successfully obtained from commercial varieties.

item.title: LecRK-V
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LecRK-V Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: Ma10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000810883 Gene Symbol: Ma10 Gene Name: pyrophosphate-energized proton pump Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Ma10 gene encodes a tonoplast P3A H+-ATPase that is involved in the regulation of apple fruit acidity.

item.title: MdARF13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000412781 Gene Symbol: MdARF13 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdDRB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdDRB1 Gene Name: dsRNA-binding protein1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A dsRNA-binding protein MdDRB1 associated with miRNA biogenesis modifies adventitious rooting and tree architecture in apple.

item.title: MdGORK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD14G1239500 Gene Symbol: MdGORK1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdIPT5b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000232324 Gene Symbol: MdIPT5b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Group-C/S1 bZIP heterodimers regulate MdIPT5b to negatively modulate drought tolerance in apple species.

item.title: MdNHX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD16G1175800 Gene Symbol: MdNHX2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdSINA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1082000 Gene Symbol: MdSINA1 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdRGL2a and MdCIPK20 were ubiquitinated and degraded by E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA1 and MdSINA2, respectively, both of which were activated in the presence of GA.

item.title: MdSINA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1218700 Gene Symbol: MdSINA2 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdRGL2a and MdCIPK20 were ubiquitinated and degraded by E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA1 and MdSINA2, respectively, both of which were activated in the presence of GA.

item.title: MdSUT4.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD08G1209900 Gene Symbol: MdSUT4.1 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 4 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The sucrose transporter MdSUT4.

item.title: MdWRKY40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1039500 Gene Symbol: MdWRKY40 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Involvement of MdWRKY40 in the defense of mycorrhizal apple against fusarium solani.

item.title: PbATL18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr007980.1 Gene Symbol: PbATL18 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase Genome: Species: Pyrus betulifolia Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PbbZIP4 is targeted for proteasome-mediated degradation by the ubiquitin ligase PbATL18 to influence pear’s resistance to Colletotrichum fructicola by regulating the expression of PbNPR3.

item.title: QHB;OsQHB
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g63510 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0854500 Gene Symbol: QHB OsQHB OsWOX5 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: VvBBX44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_200s0347g00030 Gene Symbol: VvBBX44 Gene Name: Vitis vinifera B-box protein 44 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Our previous work has shown that Vitis vinifera B-box protein 44 (VvBBX44) inhibits anthocyanin synthesis and represses VvHY5 expression in grape calli.

item.title: VvbZIP61
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_212s0028g02590 Gene Symbol: VvbZIP61 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Basic leucine zipper gene VvbZIP61 is expressed at a quantitative trait locus for high monoterpene content in grape berries.

item.title: ZjBRC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZjBRC1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Ziziphus jujuba Functional Description: Transcription factor ZjBRC1 directly binds auxin transporters ZjPIN1c and ZjPIN3 promoters and down-regulates their expression activities, thereby promoting auxin accumulation in jujube callus.
